description: Negi`s friends come in all shapes and sizes, occasionally even small, furry, foul mouthed, with a cigarette habit and a penchant for panty stealing! The little white weasel is invaluable as a confidant to Springfield, and Chamo is an integral part of some of Negi`s biggest battles and plans. Chamo spends a lot of time prodding the lad into pactios with the girls in 2-A. Of course, since the magic spells involve the young sorcerer getting a kiss, you can never really tell if Chamo is trying to help strengthen Negi`s chances as a warrior or if he`s just trying to get Springfield some romance in his life. Knowing Chamo, it`s probably both!
name: Albert Chamomile
